document.full_text: a 22-year-old former university of nebraska-lincoln honor student was sentenced thursday to 50 years in prison for killing four motorcyclists on interstate 29 in western iowa last summer.
document.title: former honor student gets 50 years for traffic deaths
lines_and_colors: a 22-year-old former university of nebraska-lincoln honor student was sentenced thursday to 50 years in prison for killing four motorcyclists on interstate 29 in western iowa last summer.
